UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial and antibiofilm activity of the EeCentrocin 1 derived peptide EC1-17KV via membrane disruption.
Literature.Author: Ma L, Ye XY, Sun P, Xu P, Wang L, Liu Z, Huang X, Bai Z, Zhou C

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human gastric epithelial cells GES-1:IC50=450 µg/ml,Human hepatocyte cells HL-7702 (L02):IC50=530 µg/ml,Sheep erythrocytes:<2% Hemolysis=512 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=32-64µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=64µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MIC=16µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis(MBC=16µg/ml),Streptococcus pyogenes(MIC=16µg/ml),Streptococcus pyogenes(MBC=16µg/ml),Streptococcus pneumoniae(MIC=128µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=8µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa CMCC 10104(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MBC=16µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 10031(MIC=32µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae(MIC=64µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=64µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Candida albicans(MFC=32µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans ATCC 28957(MIC=16µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans(MIC=8-16µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans(MFC=16µg/ml),Murine macrophage cells RAW 264.7(IC50=300µg/ml)
